name: Spark Of Nature
description:
Aloe, born from a tear drop of the sky fallen inside a dried flowerpot, grows into a new adventure to discover the meaning of his existence, and choose his fate of his life. He will wake inside the powerpot to travel through an amazing new world, where he will find other plants that will help him in his journey, ¿Are you ready to sprout?

Spark Of Nature, its the second game from RebornPlanetStudios, steping in the right direction inside the indie world, with this new and refreshing single player platform game.

Experience a game full of life!

Explore across a wide variety of unique and colorful levels, from cozy houses, to ancient ruins, to cold basements, This Aloe is ready for a joruney across the world.

Each level will have his own dinamics, goals and secret places you will have to unravel! You will not experience other Indie Eco-Friendly Game like this one!

Collect and unlock amazing skins
Inside each level, you will find Sprouted Seeds and Magic Leafs, that will unlock skins and aditional content, Let the leafs shine!

Challenge yourself and beat your marks
In Spark Of Nature, after completing each level, you will collect Cactus Points, witch they will let you progress inside the story, the less time you spent completing a level, the more Cactus Points you will get!.

Play your own way
¿Not a fan of Speedrunning? Dont worry, in Spark Of Nature, we dedicated tons of hours to make a relaxing and peaceful ambient, so you can stop to smell the flowers on your way.

This game will be updated overtime, adding new levels, progress inside the story and more free aditional content, so keep in mind that the minimum system requirements may increase.

Are you ready to sprout? Be the Spark Of Nature!
